dcterms:creator: A. Zirikly
P. Resnik
Ö. Uzuner
K. Hollingshead
dcterms:description: The University of Maryland Reddit Suicidality Dataset was developed using data from Reddit to assess the subject's suicide risk based on their posts. It includes post id, anonymous user id, timestamp, subreddit name, post title, and post body, with labels indicating varying levels of suicidality risk.
dcterms:title: University of Maryland Reddit Suicidality Dataset

dcterms:creator: H-C. Shing
S. Nair
A. Zirikly
M. Friedenberg
H. Daumé III
P. Resnik
dcterms:description: The 2015 Full Reddit Submission Corpus includes a comprehensive collection of Reddit posts used to identify suicidality risk. It serves as a foundational dataset for analyzing online postings related to mental health.
dcterms:title: 2015 Full Reddit Submission Corpus

dcterms:description: The CLPsych 2017 Shared Task Dataset was used for triaging content in online peer-support forums, focusing on mental health discussions and assessments.
dcterms:title: CLPsych 2017 Shared Task Dataset
